text: ‘It didn’t kill them, they were thrilled to be there’ with Michael Jackson.   #BarbraStreisand should be ashamed.  This is the compassionate left? You can’t dead name or use the wrong pronoun, but molestation? ‘They got over it?”   You are sick.
author: glennbeck

text: I pray for Eric.  I also pray for the men who found pleasure in their  cruelty to a grieving father.   We indeed are better than this.if we DECIDE that we are not then we deserve to spiral into chaos.  It will be our choice, will we choose to treat each other better than we have?
author: glennbeck

text: Make no mistake, the Democrats will end the free market.  They will force banks to only finance what ‘they’ believe is right and moral.  No money to gun stores, but payment processing to abortion clinic.The democrats have become a dangerous death cult and they will take control.
author: glennbeck

text: Nope. Nothing weird here at all.

text: Okay, if this doesn’t make you question ‘who’s on my team’, nothing will.   If there weren’t so many damn people leading our country that think this way, the next two minutes of your life would be hysterical.
author: glennbeck

text: Spent 3 days w/ @TonyRobbins at the LA Convention center.   He is the most genuine, good, caring and kind man I have ever met. On the scale of Billy Graham & the Dali Lama.  No offense to DL but Tony is tied for first.  (Over achiever in everything I guess).  Awesome man.
author: glennbeck

text: #ChristchurchMosqueAttack as hatred and evil grows, so does love and compassion.   NZ this is your 9/11 and, like you did with us, we stand with you and the innocent, who lost their lives.  Terrorism is terrorism no matter what the cause. Evil will fail. Love destroys terror.
author: glennbeck

text: I think RG is a genius: funny, real, unafraid and his performances have the rare spark of heart.  Red Skelton, john Candy, robin Williams.  Each could make you laugh and cry.  Let’s agree to be cool based on our mutual love for RG. We may b surprised what else we have in common.
author: glennbeck

text: Good thing the press doesn’t know us evil ‘white people’ don’t breath air.   We breath the smell of money and exhale poverty.* It is why we only pretend to care about our $22 T debt. Us White men gotta breath!   * except in Alaska & HI where we inhale love and exhale jelly beans.
author: glennbeck

text: Don’t we all just hate reasoned, rational, commentary without any name calling?  (I hear he is Jewish too) Maybe after we ban Shapiro we can go to the libraries and burn books we all hate.  Now with Amazon, it is s much easier and zero carbon footprint too. @benshapiro
author: glennbeck
